biocontainers.name: fpocket
biocontainers.summary: Fpocket: An open source platform for ligand pocket detection

biotools.summary: Web server which detects small molecule pockets by relying on the geometric alpha sphere theory. It also tracks pockets during molecular dynamics so to provide insight on pocket dynamics (mdpocket) and transposes mdpocket to the combined analysis of homologous structures (hpocket).

bioschemas.name: Fpocket
bioschemas.summary: Web server which detects small molecule pockets by relying on the geometric alpha sphere theory. It also tracks pockets during molecular dynamics so to provide insight on pocket dynamics (mdpocket) and transposes mdpocket to the combined analysis of homologous structures (hpocket).
